publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2036 Susan Deacon: The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Paralytic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (No,2) (Scotland) Order 2001—That the Health and Community Care Committee recommends that the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Paralytic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (No.2) (Scotland) Order 2001 be approved. Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm*

S1M-2036 Susan Deacon: The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Paralytic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (No,2) (Scotland) Order 2001—That the Health and Community Care Committee recommends that the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Paralytic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (No.2) (Scotland) Order 2001 be approved. Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm
